description: Palmolive Men Shower Gel With Natural Charcoal is a dermatologically tested shower gel with odour eliminating technology that provides all day freshness. Removes 99% of germs.Palmolive Men Odour Eliminating Shower Gel with Natural Charcoal.Deep Clean- Infused with 100% natural charcoal powder & green tea extract. All-day freshness- With odour modifying technology to eliminate 99% of bacteria.Fresh masculine fragrance- Refreshing fragrance with eucalyptus and orange peel essential oilsDaily Skincare For Active Men- For everyday use to leave you feeling refreshed and confident. Dermatologically tested.Product contains no Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, silicones or BPA. Made in a recyclable bottle. Size: 450mL Shower Gel PumpMENS SHOWER GEL: Palmolive Men Odour Eliminating Shower Gel with Natural Charcoal contains 100 percent natural charcoal powder and green tea extractODOUR ELIMINATING: Effectively protects against odour and kills 99% of germs.MASCULINE SCENT: Refreshing fragrance with eucalyptus and orange peel essential oilsDAILY USE: Shower gel suitable for daily use for active menFEEL FRESH: Leaves you feeling refreshed and confident.
name: Palmolive Men Body Wash Natural Charcoal Shower Gel 450mL
